rules.comment: Block domains that resolve to a Russian IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Chinese IP address.
Block domains that resolve to an Indian IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Nigerian IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Vietnamize IP address.

Block domains that resolve to a North Korean IP address.
